name: Muse Card (Pc)
description: 《Muse Card(Slot)》 contains a variety of popular chess games, including landlords, fried golden flowers, cattle, Stud, bloody battles, dragons and tigers, whirls, super six, ATT2 generation chain guns, single heads, hundred people cattle ,  Lucky Six Lions, Water Margin, Texas Hold'em, Royal Horse Racing, Ocean Star, Oriental Dragon, Li Wei Fishing, Dasheng Sea, Money Tree, etc.! Many people passion, real-time competition, conscience economy, look forward to sharing the beauty of the card with you!
